about_the_game:
History

  • A government mercenary in search of wealth and a fearless gunslinger thirsty for revenge join forces to capture a mysterious jewel. However, a corrupt banker joins the journey, complicating the mission.
    Realizing that the improper possession of the jewel could result in the destruction of the world, the characters are led to question the true intentions behind this relentless quest for power, discovering that greed carries the weight of changing the course of humanity.

Gameplay

  • A mix of traditional elements of the beat 'em up genre, with quick reactions between dodges and counterattacks.
    Variety between short and long range weapons.
    Ultimate meter, which fills up as it hits enemies, allowing you to perform a powerful attack, and a variety of techniques that allow you to perform combo attacks in the air and break defenses.

Features

  • Single Player mode with 2 playable characters and a story told in hand-animated cutscenes with comic book graphics.
    Enemy finishing system and Quick Time Event.
    Upgrade shop allowing you to unlock more types of attacks and special moves.
    Enemies with a wide variety of reactions, acidic humor and many references.
